ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: webhook trigger on triggering delete of selected records
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? webhook trigger when - multiple records are selected in one go & `Delete selected records` : bulk delete trigger - one record is selected and `Delete selected records ` : bulk delete trigger ### Desired Behavior for the latter case, it should be `delete` trigger instead of `bulk.delete` ### Project Details 204.0 ### Attachments _No response_
